titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the publique fast the twelfth day of April. At St. Maries Oxford, before the members of the honourable House of Commons there assembled; by Henry Ferne D.D. And printed by their order.
titleStmt.author: Ferne, H. (Henry), 1602-1662.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Leonard Lichfield, printer to the Vniversity,

notesStmt.note: The imprint is false. "A London counterfeit issued probably on May 7"--Madan.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
